g.text: Time it took for the world population to double

text.style: font-size: 9px; font-family: 'DejaVu Sans', 'Bitstream Vera Sans', 'Computer Modern Sans Serif', 'Lucida Grande', 'Verdana', 'Geneva', 'Lucid', 'Arial', 'Helvetica', 'Avant Garde', sans-serif; fill: #888888

g.text: The interactive data visualization is available at OurWorldInData.org.
